modules.description: Provides line editing, history management, and signal handling through C library integration. Works with strings, integers, and custom state structures for interactive command-line applications. Enables building robust CLI tools with features like input parsing and history recall.

Reads and processes user input from a terminal with support for line editing, history, and masked input. Handles ANSI escape sequences, UTF-8, and terminal-specific behaviors, and provides functions to manage history files, clear the screen, and toggle mask mode. Used for building interactive command-line tools that require secure input, history retention, and terminal-aware input handling.
